Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Use a proper cache instead of ConditionalWeakTable" (#549) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This does not add any invalidation of cache. Future changes should look
at a way to invalidate the cache; no state for a specific instance is
kept in the cache so it would be safe for use across different package
instances.
